data.title: Steve McFadden: Wiki, Bio, Age, Height, Career, Family, Wife, Net Worth
data.meta_description: Full Bio/Wiki of Steve McFadden, his parents, siblings, age, height, birthday, birthplace, family, profession, wife, children, net worth.
data.text:
Steve McFadden: Wiki, Bio, Age, Height, Career, Family, Wife, Net Worth: Steve McFadden is a popular British actor. He was born on the 20th of March 1959 in Maida Vale, London, England, The United Kingdom. Steve is well-known for his role as Phil Mitchell in the BBC One soap opera named EastEnders. He has been a part of EastEnders since 1990. To know everything about Steve McFadden and his life read this post!

Steve McFadden’s Life and Education

He was born on the 20th of March 1959. The birthplace of Steve is Maida Vale, London, England, The United Kingdom. Steve belongs to the British nationality. The current age of the popular British actor Steve is 62 years and 10 months old as of January 2022. And the zodiac sign of Steve is Pisces as per his date of birth. The popular British actor Steve celebrates his birthday on the 20th of March each year.

Regarding Steve’s physical appearance, he is 5 feet and 8 inches tall by height. The weight of Steve’s body is around 75 kg. Steve is ebullient and dashing. His personality is decent. Steve is a Britisher. According to the sources, Steve left school to do a few jobs in 1975. Steve grew up self-sufficient by doing a few jobs such as plumbing, laboring, carrot picking as well as working at a builder’s merchant at a young age. Steve chose to become an actor after attending university. Then Steve enrolled himself at the Royal Academy of Dramatic Art in 1984. From where Steve graduated in 1987.

Steve McFadden Family

There is no sufficient information available regarding Steve’s family on the internet. The name of Steve’s father is Robert Reid. The name of Steve’s mother is Barbara Mallet Reid. We don’t know whether Steve has siblings or not is in the family. Steve has not provided sufficient information regarding his family. It might be possible that Steve is the only child of his parents. But we are not sure about this information.

Steve McFadden Career- Actor

Steve McFadden is a popular British actor by profession. Professionally, Steve initiated his acting career in 1989. It was the beginning of Steve’s acting career. When Steve entered the entertainment industry. Firstly, Steve appeared as Billy in a television drama movie named The Firm. It was his debut television drama movie in which he was cast for a small role. Steve appeared in a movie named Buster as a gang member. Steve joined a BBC soap opera named EastEnders at the beginning of 1990. Steve was featured as Phil Mitchell in this soap opera.

Steve came into the limelight due to his role as Phil Mitchell in EastEnders. He has been a part of this soap opera since 1990. Moreover, Steve has also appeared in various movies and television series. Steve is also a former presenter of a real fighting series named Britain’s Hardest. He presented this real fighting series. Steve McFadden has gained massive success and fame in his successful acting career.

Steve McFadden Movies, Television Series, and Awards

Here, Steve movies and television series are including Buster, Kevin & Perry Go Large, Provoked, Murder in Mind, Bergerac, Saracen, EastEnders, The Bill, Screen Two, Minder, Dimensions in Time, etc. Steve won several awards during his acting career. Steve won The British Soap Awards, Inside Soap Awards, TV Now Awards, Digital Spy Soap Awards, etc.

Steve McFadden Net Worth

The main source of income for Steve McFadden is his successful acting career. Steve earns a good amount of income from his successful acting career. According to the sources, the estimated net worth of Steve McFadden is $3.5 million as of 2022.

Steve McFadden’s Wife and Children

Steve has not yet married. But Steve has been in a relationship with his girlfriend, Karen Cairns. From their relationship, Steve and Karen have a daughter named Frankie. Moreover, Steve has also four children; three daughters and one son from his past three relationships. Steve has a son named Matt McFadden whose mother is Sue Marshall. Steve has two daughters named Teona and Mollie Jane their mother is Angela Bostock. Not only this but Steve has also a daughter named Amelie Tinkerbell whose mother is Rachel Sidwell. Therefore, Steve has a total of five children. His four children were born from his previous three partners.
